attributes.action: award the musician Bryan Ferry a knighthood .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a solo artist, and co-founder and frontman of Roxy Music, Bryan Ferry has entertained the world for 35 years. He is a cultural ambassador for the United Kingdom, having made an indelible impact on popular culture, and his recordings have made large sums of money for the UK recording industry.
